partnerDetails.about:
Actemium can rely on distinctive system know-how for everyday work for every process in order to create turnkey solutions. Actemium's know-how covers the entire life cycle of industrial plants, from design and execution planning to installation and maintenance. 

SOLUTIONS and SERVICES:
  • Software engineering
  • Analytics & data
  • Basic engineering
  • Consulting
  • Detailed engineering (HMI)
  • Energy efficiency
  • Energy technology & power supply
  • Production
  • Installation
  • MES
  • Assembly
